Articles.Content:
Hey, the other day I was trying to relearn TF2 with a mouse (instead of a touchpad) so I was on offline practice Dustbowl, and I got very intrigued by the rocket in the map, the same rocket as in sd_doomsday.

So I have some questions... Is the rocket in those maps based on a real rocket (I was thinking it was reminiscent of a Dnepr) or just a bit of fiction? And has anyone replicated it in KSP?

So post any thoughts on that rocket. If anyone can post a screenshot of it I would appreciate it :)

Bumping because this needs to be done holy christ.

I'll see if i can do it if i get the time.
It looks a bit like the British Black Arrow.

Considering the rockets go a glorious 250ft at most before falling back and destroying all, they aren't anything special.

I could replicate it if someone was interested.
